page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: Our twelve squares are covered by the small town of{Alford,}the village of {Bilsby}and the surrounding countryside. Alford is a{market town,}banking centre, education centre and a town where people come to work. It has a central market place with shops around it. Three main roads run from the market place with houses in between. The village of Bilsby has grown during the last few years and has a pub, church and a shop. The countryside is flat covered by large fields which grow crops. We have one large dairy farm in our area. The climate is quite dry but we get a lot of low cloud and mist in summer. Alford has become more important as a tourist centre over the last few years with the start of the Friday{craft {market.
